Detailed Description

Internal configuration class.

Should not be used directly.

See also:
Config CONFIG

uint _Config::SCR_BPP (  ) [inline]

Screen bits per pixel (color depth).

Valid values are 8, 16, 24 and 32.

uint _Config::SCR_ColorKey ( SDL_Surface *  s ) [inline]

Returns by-surface formated colorkey.

Ensures that the pixel format of the surface is respected.
